predicate.note: Frames file for 'revert' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: both arguments
example.text: The committee is formulating Hong Kong 's constitution for when it reverts to Chinese control in 1997 [*T*-1] , and Chinese lawmakers said [0] the two can only return if they `` abandon their antagonistic stand against the Chinese government and their attempt [*] to nullify the Sino-British joint declaration on Hong Kong . ''
